citations.narrative:
In the morning of 26 April 2025, a male fallow deer "Timmy" was found dead in a pen where no other animals were
housed. His head and neck were caught in a loop of metal chain hanging from the fence, which held open a gate when in
use. The facility suspects the cause of death to be strangulation. The facility made corrections to the rest of the primary
enclosures by shortening the loops of chain to prevent animal body parts becoming caught up in them. Failure to maintain
housing facilities that are structurally sound may result in severe injury or death to animals. The indoor and outdoor
housing facilities shall be structurally sound and maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and to
contain the animals.
Correct from this date forward of 16 May 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Critical
   
Facilities, general. 
In the morning of 26 April 2025, a male fallow deer "Timmy" was found dead in a pen where no other animals were 
housed. His head and neck were caught in a loop of metal chain hanging from the fence, which held open a gate when in 
use. The facility suspects the cause of death to be strangulation. The facility made corrections to the rest of the primary 
enclosures by shortening the loops of chain to prevent animal body parts becoming caught up in them. Failure to maintain 
housing facilities that are structurally sound may result in severe injury or death to animals. The indoor and outdoor 
housing facilities shall be structurally sound and maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and to 
contain the animals.  
 
Correct from this date forward of 16 May 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
